projects.title: TextEdit
projects.description: I created this app using React.js and Bootstrap. Features  1) Can convert Text to UpperCase/LowerCase 2) Clear Text /Copy Text in one click  4) Removes extra spaces from paragraph  5) Auto gramatical recomendations . 6) Can Count no of Words/Characters.  7) Gives you the estimate reading time of the Text . 8) Preview Text is also Enabled .
